alert.note: Alert for Butler; Muhlenberg; Ohio (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 1:35PM EST until February 21 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky... Green River at Rochester affecting Muhlenberg, Butler and Ohio Counties. .Heavy rain from the past 48 hours will cause the river to rise. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO EARLY TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Green River at Rochester. * WHEN...From this evening to early Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 34.0 feet, Rochester Ferry stops operation. At 37.0 feet, Reeds and Rochester Ferries remain closed. KY 369 floods one mile north of Rochester. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:45 AM CST Friday the stage was 36.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 37.7 feet early Sunday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Monday evening. - Flood stage is 37.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 17.7 feet on 05/08/2013. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you are affected by these crests take any necessary actions. Additional information is available at water.weather.gov/ahps2/index. php?wfo=lmk Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio and your local media for the latest information. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lmk. The next statement will be issued Saturday morning.
